name: stealth
description: Allows the user to move silently and remain undetected.

name: lockpicking
description: Grants the user the ability to pick various types of locks.

name: fireball
description: Enables the user to cast a fire-based projectile spell.

name: healing
description: Allows the user to heal minor to moderate wounds.

name: tracking
description: Permits the user to follow trails and track creatures.

name: water-breathing
description: Allows the user to breathe underwater for short periods.

name: shield
description: Creates a protective barrier that blocks incoming damage.

name: invisibility
description: Turns the user invisible for a limited amount of time.
